name: undernet
description: A modular, configuration-first front-end framework. No strings.
author: George Treviranus

scripts.setup: npm i && npm run js:build && bundle install
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config-dev.yml
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:scripts:prod && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config-prod.yml
scripts.watch: npm run build:scripts && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build:scripts: npm run clean:scripts && BABEL_ENV=cjs rollup -c rollup.config.site.js
scripts.build:scripts:prod: npm run clean:scripts && BABEL_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.config.site.js
scripts.lint: npm run scss:lint && npm run js:lint
scripts.build:dist: npm run js:build && npm run js:build:bundle && npm run css:package
scripts.build:dist:release: npm run build:dist:clean && npm run scss:prepublish && npm run css:prepublish && npm run js:prepublish && npm run node:create-hashes
scripts.prettify: npm run js:prettify && npm run scss:prettify
scripts.js:build: npm run js:build:clean && npm run js:build:cjs && npm run js:build:esm
scripts.js:watch: npm run js:build:clean && BABEL_ENV=esm babel src/js/ -d lib/esm/ --watch --ignore 'src/js/index.bundle.js' --no-comments -s
scripts.js:prepublish: npm run js:build && npm run js:build:bundle && npm run js:modules:zip && npm run js:zip
scripts.css:package: npm run css:build && npm run css:build:minify && npm run css:prefix
scripts.css:prepublish: npm run css:package && cd dist/ && zip -r undernet.css.zip . -x *.js *.zip *.js.map
scripts.postversion: npm run node:update-version && npm run build:dist:release && git add -A && git commit --amend
